modShortDescription: The Defence Platform will hide your turrets underground when not powered.
modDescription:
The Defence Platform will hide your turrets underground when not powered. For now Three08 has made it so only [turrets](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-traps/) can be place on top as some other blocks were causing errors.

**Demo:**

This is a DMT mod. So requires [DMT Modding Tool](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/13037-dmt-modding-tool/).

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/qukvgwso8f8dqh7/DefencePlatform_v1.0.rar/file)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24606-defence-platform/).

**Credits:** [Three08](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/three08/)
